866410.name: Fantasy Grounds - EN5ider: Nature's Remedy (5E)
866410.description:
EN5ider: Nature's Remedy

An introduction to the craft of herbalism, a handful of example herbs including darkberries, firedrake petals, silver garlic, and more, plus rules for their preparation, and a the new Master Herbalist feat.
This product includes:
  • New feat: Master Herbalist
  • 11 unique items
  • 6 interesting story entries
By Russ Morrissey
illustrated by Indi Martin
Conversion by David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
